thread.title: Michelle Obama: I want to be Beyonce
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama: I want to be Beyonce | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Michelle Obama: I want to be Beyonce
text:
Other Articles After Aishwarya Rai's 'Jazbaa' film, Sanjay Gupta to announce two new projects Naomi Campbell gets six-month suspended prison sentence Evan Ross, Ashlee Simpson welcome daughter First Lady Michelle Obama has joked that she wants to be Beyonce Knowles.
When asked by rapper Wale, while promoting their Reach Higher campaign, what she would like to do if she had a different occupation, Michelle gave the surprising answer, reported Prople magazine.
“I would be Beyonce. I’ve got the hands,” she said demonstrating her moves.
Beyonce, 33, even performed at 51-year-old Michelle’s 50th birthday last year.
She also performed at the Neighborhood Ball celebrating the president’s inauguration in 2009.
President Obama has previously noted that his wife and the singer, 33, share a similar charisma.
First Published on August 01, 2015 12:17 pm
